# audiovisualMIMETypes()

**Type Method**

Returns an array of the MIME types the asset supports.

## Declaration

```swift
class func audiovisualMIMETypes() -> [String]
```

## Return Value

An array of MIME type strings.

## Determining supported media types

- **audiovisualTypes()**: Returns an array of the file types the asset supports.
- **isPlayableExtendedMIMEType(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is playable with the specified codecs and container type.
- **audiovisualContentTypes**: Provides the content types the AVURLAsset class understands.
